text: Dangerous Tour () is a 1969 Soviet adventure movie directed by Georgi Yungvald-Khilkevich.Смерть любовницы Владимира Высоцкого унесла ее главную тайнуОПАСНЫЕ ГАСТРОЛИ (1969) It stars Vladimir Vysotsky, Yefim Kopelyan, and Nikolai Grinko. == Actors == *Vladimir Vysotsky as George Bengalsky (Nikolay Kovalenko) *Yefim Kopelyan as Ivan Tarielovich Bobruisky-Dumbadze, police chief«Опасные гастроли» в кабаре, автор Элла Фурманская * Nikolai Grinko as Andrey Maksimovic (Viscount de Cordelia) * Ivan Pereverzev as Kazimierz Kazimirovich Kulbras, Governor General * Georgi Yumatov as Maksim * Kira Muratova as Nina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1969 movies Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: Dangerous Tour (movie)
